languages.text: {n}Испугавшись собственных слов, Кассия прикрывает рот ладонью, бледнеет, вспыхивает, снова бледнеет, и смущенно скрывает лицо за завесой снежных волос.{/n} "Прошу... меня извинить. Леди-Навигатору не пристало вести себя столь неподобающим образом".

traits.locale_text: {n}Испугавшись собственных слов, Кассия прикрывает рот ладонью, бледнеет, вспыхивает, снова бледнеет, и смущенно скрывает лицо за завесой снежных волос.{/n} "Прошу... меня извинить. Леди-Навигатору не пристало вести себя столь неподобающим образом".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Frightened by her own words, Cassia covers her mouth, pales, blushes, then pales again, and hides her face behind the cascade of her snow-white hair.{/n} "I... beg your pardon, Lord Captain. That was no way for a Navigator to conduct herself."
languages.original_text: {n}Испугавшись собственных слов, Кассия прикрывает рот ладонью, бледнеет, вспыхивает, снова бледнеет, и смущенно скрывает лицо за завесой снежных волос.{/n} "Прошу... меня извинить. Леди-Навигатору не пристало вести себя столь неподобающим образом".

traits.locale_text: {n}Frightened by her own words, Cassia covers her mouth, pales, blushes, then pales again, and hides her face inside the cascade of her snow-white hair.{/n} "I... beg your pardon, Lord Captain. This is no way for a Lady Navigator to conduct herself."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Frightened by her own words, Cassia covers her mouth, pales, blushes, then pales again, and hides her face inside the cascade of her snow-white hair.{/n} "I... beg your pardon, Lord Captain. This is no way for a Lady Navigator to conduct herself."

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Frightened by her own words, Cassia covers her mouth, pales, blushes, then pales again, and hides her face behind the cascade of her snow-white hair.{/n} "I... beg your pardon, Lord Captain. That was no way for a Navigator to conduct herself."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia erschrickt vor ihren eigenen Worten, hält sich den Mund zu, erblasst, errötet, erblasst wieder und versteckt ihr Gesicht dann hinter dem Vorhang ihrer schneeweißen Haare.{/n} "Ich ... bitte um Verzeihung, Lord Captain. So darf eine Navigatorin sich nicht benehmen."
languages.original_text: {n}Frightened by her own words, Cassia covers her mouth, pales, blushes, then pales again, and hides her face behind the cascade of her snow-white hair.{/n} "I... beg your pardon, Lord Captain. That was no way for a Navigator to conduct herself."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia erschrickt vor ihren eigenen Worten, hält sich den Mund zu, erblasst, errötet, erblasst wieder und versteckt ihr Gesicht dann hinter dem Vorhang ihrer schneeweißen Haare.{/n} "Ich ... bitte um Verzeihung, Lord Captain. So darf eine Lady Navigator sich nicht benehmen."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Effrayée par ses propres mots, Cassia se couvre la bouche, pâlit, rougit comme une pivoine, puis pâlit à nouveau et se cache le visage derrière une cascade de cheveux blancs comme la neige.{/n} « Je... je vous prie de me pardonner, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Ce n'était pas un comportement convenable de la part d'une navigatrice. »
languages.original_text: {n}Frightened by her own words, Cassia covers her mouth, pales, blushes, then pales again, and hides her face behind the cascade of her snow-white hair.{/n} "I... beg your pardon, Lord Captain. That was no way for a Navigator to conduct herself."

traits.locale_text: {n}Effrayée par ses propres mots, Cassia se couvre la bouche, pâlit, rougit comme une pivoine, puis pâlit à nouveau et se cache le visage derrière une cascade de cheveux blancs comme la neige.{/n} « Je... je vous prie de me pardonner, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Ce n'était pas un comportement convenable de la part d'une navigatrice. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}卡西娅似乎是被自己冲口而出的一番话吓到了。她捂住嘴巴，脸色一会儿白、一会儿红，随后将失去血色的面容埋在白雪般的秀发中。{/n}“我……请你原谅我，舰长大人。作为导航者，我实在是太失态了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Frightened by her own words, Cassia covers her mouth, pales, blushes, then pales again, and hides her face behind the cascade of her snow-white hair.{/n} "I... beg your pardon, Lord Captain. That was no way for a Navigator to conduct herself."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅似乎是被自己冲口而出的一番话吓到了。她捂住嘴巴，脸色一会儿白、一会儿红，随后将失去血色的面容埋在白雪般的秀发中。{/n}“我……请你原谅我，舰长大人。作为导航者，我实在是太失态了。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}自分の言葉に驚きながらカシアは口を覆い、青ざめ、赤面し、再び青ざめる。そして顔を、雪のように白い、流れる髪に隠す。{/n}「申し訳…ございません、ロード・キャプテン。航宙士が、このようにふるまうべきではありませんでした」
languages.original_text: {n}Frightened by her own words, Cassia covers her mouth, pales, blushes, then pales again, and hides her face behind the cascade of her snow-white hair.{/n} "I... beg your pardon, Lord Captain. That was no way for a Navigator to conduct herself."

traits.locale_text: {n}自分の言葉に驚きながらカシアは口を覆い、青ざめ、赤面し、再び青ざめる。そして顔を、雪のように白い、流れる髪に隠す。{/n}「申し訳…ございません、ロード・キャプテン。航宙士が、このようにふるまうべきではありませんでした」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Asustada por sus propias palabras, Cassia se tapa la boca, palidece, se sonroja, vuelve a palidecer y esconde el rostro tras su cascada de cabello blanco como la nieve.{/n} «Perdón, Lord Capitán. Así no debería comportarse ningún navegante».
languages.original_text: {n}Frightened by her own words, Cassia covers her mouth, pales, blushes, then pales again, and hides her face behind the cascade of her snow-white hair.{/n} "I... beg your pardon, Lord Captain. That was no way for a Navigator to conduct herself."

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Frightened by her own words, Cassia covers her mouth, pales, blushes, then pales again, and hides her face behind the cascade of her snow-white hair.{/n} "I... beg your pardon, Lord Captain. That was no way for a Navigator to conduct herself."

languages.text: {n}Kendi sarf ettiği sözlerden korkan Cassia, ağzını kapatıyor. Rengi soluyor, kızarıyor, sonra yeniden soluyor. Yüzünü, çağlayan gibi dökülen kar beyazı saçlarının ardına gizliyor.{/n} "A... Affına sığınıyorum Lord Kaptan. Bir Rotacı'ya katiyen yakışmayacak bir davranış oldu."
languages.original_text: {n}Frightened by her own words, Cassia covers her mouth, pales, blushes, then pales again, and hides her face behind the cascade of her snow-white hair.{/n} "I... beg your pardon, Lord Captain. That was no way for a Navigator to conduct herself."
